    void drawCommandFailure​(java.lang.String whatFailed)

    void drawFailedAction()
    print action failed if an action fail
    void drawLooseGame​(java.lang.String loser)
    print the loser's name
    void drawMap()
    This function converts the values ​​of the virtual matrix map to those to be displayed in the prompt. 1.Create the edges of the map and draw each cell of the map according to a structure consisting of 9 spaces 2.According to the level changes color of cells 3.If the worker is selectable then it will be surrounded by the "##" symbol 4.If the cells are selectable then the cell will be surrounded by the "§§" symbol 5.According to the player, the corresponding workers have different colors to distinguish them
    void drawPartyOwnerGodChoices​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> godList)
    print all the gods available and chosen by the party owner

    • drawMap

      public void drawMap()
      This function converts the values ​​of the virtual matrix map to those to be displayed in the prompt. 1.Create the edges of the map and draw each cell of the map according to a structure consisting of 9 spaces 2.According to the level changes color of cells 3.If the worker is selectable then it will be surrounded by the "##" symbol 4.If the cells are selectable then the cell will be surrounded by the "§§" symbol 5.According to the player, the corresponding workers have different colors to distinguish them
      Overrides:
      drawMap in class Drawer

    • drawWinGame

      public void drawWinGame()
      print the winner's name
